category.pattern: HOW MANY TOES DO CATS HAVE
category.template: Cats have 18 toes in total: 5 toes on each front paw and 4 toes on each back paw.

category.pattern: HOW MANY CAT BREEDS DO EXIST
category.template: Various organizations give different answers on the number of cat breeds: The International Cat Organization recognizes 73 breeds, while Cat Fanciers' Association recognizes only 45.

category.pattern: HOW MANY BONES DO CATS HAVE
category.template: Cats have 230 bones, while humans have only 206.

category.pattern: HOW TO KNOW IF A CAT IS HAPPY OR SAD
category.template: If a cat meows loudly when seeing you, it is a sign of its happiness. Purring also means that the cat is happy. But if the cat twitches its tails rapidly or hisses it a sign of anger. If the cat loses appetite it a straight mean of its sadness.
Siberian (or Amur) tiger is considered to be the biggest cat species in the world. Adult Siberian male tigers can reach 700 pounds in weight and measure 2,7 to 3,6 metres in length(including tail).

category.pattern: HOW MANY YEARS DO CATS LIVE
